sect1.title: FROMJSON

row.entry: The RECORD structure to produce. Each field should specify the XPATH to the data in the jsonstring that it should hold. If omitted, the lower-cased field names are used.
A string containing the JSON to convert.

sect1.para: The FROMJSON function returns a single row (record) in the record format from the specified jsonstring. This may be used anywhere a single row can be used (similar to the ROW function).
